page.title: 13POLITICS
page.content: The main local news for 1985 is as follows: New housing development in South End has caused much controversy.At a Parish Council meeting objections were heard from village inhabitants and noted.However the Parish Council passed the planning application but the Borough Council turned down the application.This decision is now being appealed against. Mothers in the village have started a Brownie Pack this year.They use the School Hall as their meeting place.It is hoped to begin Guides in 1986. The school has taken part in the B.B.C.Domesday project.The staff and pupils have found it of great benefit and interest.
